Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill for the relief of the city of Minot, North Dakota.

summary.text: Relieves a city in North Dakota from liability for repayment of a specified sum associated with excess capacity of the Minot Pipeline resulting from enactment of the Garrison Diversion Unit Reformulation Act of 1986 (Public Law 99-294). Requires such city to reimburse the United States for such excess capacity ever actually used.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the city of Minot, North Dakota.
